text: Abi Ofarim, born Avraham Reichstadt (5 October 1937 â€“ 4 May 2018)Discogs.com was an Israeli singer, musician and dancer. He was born in Safed, Mandatory Palestine. In 1961, he married Esther Ofarim, his musical duo. Their greatest success in Germany came the next year with "Morning of my Life", written by the Bee Gees. In 1968 "Cinderella Rockefella" hit the top of the charts in a number of countries including the UK. Ofarim died on 4 May 2018 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Israeli singers Category:Israeli musicians Category:Dancers
title: Abi Ofarim
